title: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich, meaty sauce.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat oil and sauté onion and garlic.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve sauce over spaghetti.

title: Chicken Fried Rice
description: Quick and easy fried rice with chicken and vegetables.
instructions: Scramble eggs and set aside.
Sauté chicken until cooked.
Add vegetables and cook until tender.
Add rice, eggs, and soy sauce; stir well.
Garnish with green onions.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Delicious ground beef tacos with fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning.
Fill taco shells with beef.
Top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.

title: Pancakes
description: Fluffy homemade pancakes perfect for breakfast.
instructions: Mix dry ingredients together.
Whisk wet ingredients separately.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Cook on a griddle until bubbles form and edges are dry.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine tossed with Caesar dressing and croutons.
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing.
Add croutons and parmesan cheese.
Squeeze lemon juice on top and serve.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Classic grilled cheese sandwich with melted cheddar.
instructions: Butter the outside of each bread slice.
Place cheese between bread slices.
Grill on pan until golden brown and cheese is melted.

title: Tomato Soup
description: Smooth and creamy homemade tomato soup.
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic.
Add tomatoes and broth.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Blend until smooth, add cream, and season.

title: Banana Bread
description: Moist and sweet banana bread with a hint of cinnamon.
instructions: Mash bananas and mix with melted butter.
Add sugar, egg, and vanilla.
Mix dry ingredients and combine with banana mixture.
Pour into loaf pan and bake at 350°F for 50-60 minutes.

title: Omelette
description: Easy, fluffy omelette with your choice of fillings.
instructions: Beat eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Melt butter in a pan.
Pour egg mixture and cook until almost set.
Add cheese and veggies, fold, and finish cooking.
